sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' function BookTrip({user}) { const [noOfSeats, setSNoOfSeats] = useState(1) const[trip, setTrip] = useState({}) const[route, setRoutes] = useState({}) const[bus, setBus] = useState({}) const token = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); const passenger = localStorage.getItem("passenger"); const id = useParams() function clickUp () { let newNumber = noOfSeats +1 setSNoOfSeats(newNumber) } function clickDown () { if (noOfSeats > 1) { let newNumber = noOfSeats -1 setSNoOfSeats(newNumber) } else { setSNoOfSeats(1) } } useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:3000/trips/${id.id}`, { method: "GET", headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((res) =>{ setTrip(res) setRoutes(res.route) setBus(res.bus) }) } , []) function handlePayment(){ console.log(passenger) fetch(`http://localhost:3000/passengers/${parseInt(passenger)}`,{ method: "POST", headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }}).then(r=>r.json()).then(data=>console.log(data)) fetch(`http://localhost:3000/transactions`, { method: "POST", headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, body: JSON.stringify() }) .then(res=>res.json()) } return (

All Times Are in EAT

Trip Details

FROM

{route.start}

TO

{route.destination}

DEPARTURE

{Date(trip.departure)}

BUS REG

{bus.number_plate}

Payment Details

PRICE

{route.price * noOfSeats}

NO-OF-SEATS

{noOfSeats}

PHONE-NUMBER

0712345678

PASSENGER NAME

NICCO NJERU{id.id}

ALL BOOKINGS ARE DONE THROUGH MPESA

DEPATURE IS STRICTLY AT THE STATED TIME

NO REFUNDS TO BE MADE FOR LATE ARRIVALS

) } export default BookTrip
